title: AGNFAB
author: AGNFAB
content: I am trying the waters for 2 of my recent artworks: Sound Money and Lucid Dream. Medium used: pencils, winsor & newton pro markers and sharpies. Paper is 120g/m2 acid free, 297x420mm. Price per artwork is BTC0.003354 ≈100usd or BTC0.005 ≈150usd   for both artworks. I ship from Sweden. Shipping is included in the purchase of the artwork/s and the buyer will get a tracking number.(Both artworks comes with a certificate of authenticity).Have a beautiful day./Sid (Sound Money) (Lucid Dream)

comments.author: aoluain
comments.body: Very colourful works AGNFAB, Here they are posted below. Best of luck with the sale!If you are interested you can pay a small fee and become a copper member on the forumso that you can post images as a newbie! > https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2385104

comments.author: AGNFAB
comments.body: Tnx a lot for uploading the pictures
